cs113.calendar.guiview
Class ViewState

java.lang.Object
  cs113.calendar.guiview.ViewState

public class ViewState
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton object used to represent the global state of the GUI. May take on one of the states defined in the State enum.

Author:
Michael Koval

Field Detail

listeners

private javax.swing.event.EventListenerList listeners
The poor change listeners. They don't know what they're getting themselves into. This class produces lots of change events. You can't breath whithout someone noticing and firing a change event.
